How to set custom bitrates on firmware 1.8.9 in autoexec.ash. See the bitrate_mod directory for an example.

To set a custom bitrate for a resolution do:
writew [address] [bitrate]

ex:
writew 0xA065BBBE 0x42AC
makes 3840x2160 30p high quality setting encode at 90mbs

bitrates (you can pick values in between or above these for fine tuning):
0x4190 18mbs
0x41F0 30mbs
0x4210 36mbs
0x4220 40mbs
0x4234 45mbs
0x4270 60mbs
0x4284 70mbs
0x4298 80mbs
0x42AC 90mbs
0x42C8 100mbs
0x42D4 110mbs
0x42E8 120mbs
0x42FC 130mbs
0x4307 140mbps
0x4310 150mbps
0x431C 160mbps
0x4320 170mbps
0x432B 180mbps
0x4333 190mbps
0x433C 200mbps
0x4347 210mbps
0x434D 220mbps
0x4370 250mbps

(120mbs works if your card is fast enough, the camera crashes if 150mbs is used 
for more than like 3 seconds. If you want to properly test if your card can 
handle a bitrate you need to test for more than a few minutes preferably 
recording lots of motion. If you get a slow sd card error it means your sd card 
is too slow and that the camera stopped recording for a few seconds in order to 
catch up)


addresses for high quality bitrate (+0x10 = medium, +0x20 = low):

NTSC:
0xA065BBBE 3840x2160 30P 16:9
0xA065BBEE 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA065BC1E 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super
0xA065BC4E 2976x2976 30P 1:1
0xA065BC7E 2688x2688 30P 1:1
0xA065BCAE 2704x1520 60P 16:9
0xA065BCDE 2704x1520 30P 16:9
0xA065BD0E 2704x1520 48P 16:9
0xA065BD3E 2704x1520 24P 16:9
0xA065BD6E 2704x1520 30P 16:9 super
0xA065BD9E 2704x2032 30P 4:3
0xA065BDCE 2560x1920 30P 4:3
0xA065BDFE 2560x1440 60P 16:9
0xA065BE2E 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA065BE5E HDR 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA065BE8E 2304x1296 30P 16:9
0xA065BEBE 1920x1440 60P 4:3
0xA065BEEE 1920x1440 30P 4:3
0xA065BF1E 1920x1440 48P 4:3
0xA065BF4E 1920x1440 24P 4:3
0xA065BF7E 1920x1080 60P 16:9
0xA065BFAE 1920x1080 60P 16:9 super
0xA065BFDE 1920x1080 45P 16:9
0xA065C00E 1920x1080 40P 16:9
0xA065C03E 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA065C06E 1920x1080 30P 16:9 super
0xA065C09E HDR 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA065C0CE 1920x1080 60I 16:9
0xA065C0FE 1440x1080 60P 16:9
0xA065C12E 1440x1080 30P 16:9
0xA065C15E 1440x1080 60I 16:9
0xA065C18E 1600x1200 60P 4:3
0xA065C1BE 1600x1200 30P 4:3
0xA065C1EE 1440x1080 30P 4:3
0xA065C21E 1600x900 30P 16:9
0xA065C24E 1280x720 60P 16:9
0xA065C27E 1280x720 60P 16:9 super
0xA065C2AE 1280x720 30P 16:9
0xA065C2DE 848x480 60P 16:9
0xA065C30E 848x480 30P 16:9
0xA065C33E 848x480 30P 16:9 super
0xA065C36E 848x480 60P 16:9 super
0xA065C39E 720x480 60P 16:9
0xA065C3CE 720x480 30P 4:3
0xA065C3FE 1280x960 60P 4:3
0xA065C42E 1280x960 30P 4:3
0xA065C45E 960x540 30P 16:9
0xA065C48E 640x360 30P 16:9
0xA065C4BE 640x480 60P 4:3
0xA065C4EE 640x480 30P 4:3
0xA065C51E 432x240 60P 16:9
0xA065C54E 432x240 30P 16:9
0xA065C57E 320x240 30P 4:3
0xA065C5AE 352x240 30P 4:3
0xA065C5DE 2560x1440 50P 16:9
0xA065C60E 1920x1080 48P 16:9
0xA065C63E 1920x1080 24P 16:9
0xA065C66E 1920x1080 15P 16:9
0xA065C69E 1600x1200 48P 4:3
0xA065C6CE 1600x1200 24P 4:3
0xA065C6FE 1280x960 48P 4:3
0xA065C72E 1280x960 24P 4:3
0xA065C75E 1280x720 48P 16:9
0xA065C78E 1280x720 24P 16:9
0xA065C7BE 848x480 48P 16:9
0xA065C7EE 848x480 24P 16:9
0xA065C81E 640x480 48P 4:3
0xA065C84E 640x480 24P 4:3
0xA065C87E Precise
0xA065C8AE 1920x1080 120P 16:9
0xA065C8DE 1920x1080 120P 16:9 super
0xA065C90E 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA065C93E 1280x720 240P 16:9
0xA065C96E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA065C99E 1280x720 120P 16:9
0xA065C9CE 1280x720 120P 16:9 super
0xA065C9FE 848x480 240P 16:9
0xA065CA2E 848x480 120P 16:9
0xA065CA5E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA065CA8E 848x480 120P 16:9 super
0xA065CABE 640x480 240P 4:3
0xA065CAEE 640x480 120P 4:3
0xA065CB1E 432x240 240P 16:9
0xA065CB4E 432x240 120P 16:9
0xA065CB7E 320x240 120P 4:3
0xA065CBAE 1280x960 120P 4:3
0xA065CBDE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super

PAL:
0xA065BBBE 3840x2160 25P 16:9
0xA065BBEE 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA065BC1E 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super

0xA065C99E 1280x720 100P 16:9
0xA065C9CE 1280x720 100P 16:9 super
0xA065C9FE 848x480 200P 16:9
0xA065CA2E 848x480 100P 16:9
0xA065CA5E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA065CA8E 848x480 100P 16:9 super
0xA065CABE 640x480 200P 4:3
0xA065CAEE 640x480 100P 4:3
0xA065CB1E 432x240 200P 16:9
0xA065CB4E 432x240 100P 16:9
0xA065CB7E 320x240 100P 16:9
0xA065CBAE 1280x960 100P 4:3
0xA065CBDE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super


The resolution/bitrate table is located in /dev/mtdblock1 at position 
0x0055BBB8. This entire partition gets loaded into memory at boot at offset 
0xA0100000.
